descriptionHtml:
****************************************************************************
* Soul Gem Crafting Station by Puff The Magic Dragon *
****************************************************************************

===========
Description
===========
This mod adds a new crafting station to the Arch Mage\'s Quarters, AFTER completing the College of Winterhold series of quests, which allows you to craft soul gem fragments into full soul gems.

After completing the College of Winterhold series of quests, a courier races to you to deliver a letter. Turns out the Psijic Order wants to express their gratitude and is having a special gift delivered to your new quarters at the college.

There are already a plethora of mods of this sort in existence, but I felt most of them lacked something important - a dedicated crafting station for soul gems. Then I found Enhanced Soul Gems by Tasciovanus and liked that he had created a dedicated crafting station, but I saw room for improvement. I especially preferred the recipes from CS Soul Fragments to Soul Gems - Now LORECRAFT Compatible by Mush and I liked the idea of a dedicated unique model for the crafting station.

This mod combines these features with quest interaction (I\'m not cool enough for a full custom quest yet) to make what I feel is a more complete soul gem crafting mod without any of the extra bells and whistles.


================
Special Features
================
Unique dedicated model for the crafting station. To use, activate like normal!
You can pick up and move the crafting station (hold E)!
Or carry it in your inventory (activate while sneaking)!
So you can put this station in your preferred player home!

Recipes as follows:
1 soul gem fragment => 1 soul gem fragment: polished
2 soul gem fragment: polished => petty soul gem
3 soul gem fragment: polished => lesser soul gem
4 soul gem fragment: polished => common soul gem
5 soul gem fragment: polished => greater soul gem
6 soul gem fragment: polished => grand soul gem
6 soul gem fragment: polished + 1 daedra heart => black soul gem

The soul gem fragment recipes will only show up if you have said fragments in your inventory.

============
Installation
============
Recommended NMM:
Click and run!

Manual:
Extract the files directly into your <game folder>\\Data folder.


=============
Compatibility
=============
This mod touches nothing vanilla, so it should be compatible with any mod out there.


=====
Notes
=====
Since there are several types of soul gem fragments, it was necessary, as Mush so delicately did, to make an intermediate item that all the fragments get converted into. Otherwise you\'d need a million recipes for any conceivable combination of fragments. I completely ripped off his \"polished soul gem fragment\" but left the polished at the end for easier sorting.

Known Bug
When crafting soul gems, your enchantment skill will go up REALLY fast. This cannot be helped, it\'s something in the algorithm Bethesda uses to calculate skill usage.


===============
Version History
===============
Version 1.0 - Version 1 - adds crafting station with quest interaction

And many thanks to Bethesda for making such an awesome game and for making the creation kit that lets people like me with way too much free time modify the game.

Thanks to God for creating us all!
